member.name: M:Crawler.CrawlerService.StartCrawler
member.summary: Starts listening to queue. When new url is added to queue, starts scrapper. All found urls on the page adds back to the queue

member.name: M:Crawler.Services.IScrapperService.ScrapeAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets data from the url and extracts all important information and saves in in Index Storage

member.name: M:Crawler.Services.ScrapperService.ScrapeAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Gets data from the url and extracts all important information and saves in in Index Storage
